name: Settar Tanriögen
summary: Settar Tanriögen. Actor: Vavien. Theater, film and TV series actor.  Graduated from Hacettepe University Archeology and Art History Department. The actor , who has worked in many jobs since her primary school years, has worked as a shoe shiner, tea maker and waitress. His interest in theater started in 1980. He took part in a play prepared for the centennial of Atatürk's birth at a public education center in...
